input_text:
Job Title: Automotive ADAS Calibration Technician

Location: Grand Rapids, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Protech Automotive Solutions is looking for highly talented, dedicated and quality-focused teammates to provide top tier service to our customers.

Job Summary

Protech Automotive Solutions has an immediate job opening for an ADAS Calibration Technician to perform all-purpose duties, which may include, but not limited to: Perform static and dynamic ADAS Calibrations on foreign, domestic and EV (electric) vehicles and troubleshoot complex calibration repairs. Test drive vehicles after repairs and adequately explain ADAS calibration specifications and repair planning needs; to include collision repair center personnel, insurance adjusters, and direct customers. Complete pre and post scans with OE and/or aftermarket tools and more.

Caliber has grown to 1,600 centers nationwide and features a full range of automotive services, including Caliber Collision, one of the nation’s largest auto collision repair provider across 41 states; Caliber Auto Care for mechanical repair and quick oil change services and Caliber Auto Glass for glass repair and replacements and Protech Automotive for mobile scans, diagnostics, alignments and mechanical repairs. With the Purpose of Restoring the Rhythm of Your Life®, Caliber’s more than 25,000 teammates are committed to getting customers back on the road safely — and back to the rhythm of their lives — every day. Dedicated to providing outstanding customer experience, Caliber continues to rank among the highest customer satisfaction scores in the industry.

By joining Caliber, you can help us Restore the Rhythm of our Customers Lives. We see the potential in every member of our team and look for every opportunity to advance their careers. We believe in consistent career training on leadership skills and new technologies to make sure every teammate has an opportunity to achieve their career goals.

Benefits

Industry Leading PayPaid Vacation & HolidaysCareer growth opportunities – we promote from within!Industry leading Comprehensive healthcare benefits – eligible on day 1!Paid Skilled Trainings and Certifications (I-Car and ASE)Employee referral programUniforms Provided

Requirements

Must be at least 21 years of ageMust have a valid driver’s license and be eligible for coverage under our company insurance policyEffective verbal and written communication skillsMust possess organizational and multi-tasking skills, good time management and the ability to adapt easily to fast-paced environmentMust have the ability to read and understand instructions, written estimates and work ordersMust be able to provide personable, friendly “World Class” customer service to internal and external customersMust maintain a well-groomed, professional appearanceMust be able to pass all pre-employment screenings including background, criminal and MVR checks

Caliber is an Equal Opportunity Employer!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Automotive ADAS Calibration Technician
output_json.summary: Protech Automotive Solutions is seeking an ADAS Calibration Technician for various duties including static and dynamic calibrations, troubleshooting, and testing.
job_responsibilities: Perform static and dynamic ADAS calibrations on vehicles
Explain ADAS calibration specifications and repair planning needs
Complete pre and post scans with tools
output_json.company_information: Caliber has grown to 1,600 centers nationwide featuring automotive services such as Caliber Collision, Caliber Auto Care, and Protech Automotive.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Caliber is an Equal Opportunity Employer!
